languages.text: "А также лжец и убийца. Коли обличаешь меня, не забывай все мои преступления, ибо я не буду их отрицать".

traits.locale_text: "А также лжец и убийца. Коли обличаешь меня, не забывай все мои преступления, ибо я не буду их отрицать".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
languages.original_text: "А также лжец и убийца. Коли обличаешь меня, не забывай все мои преступления, ибо я не буду их отрицать".

traits.locale_text: "As well as a liar and a murderer. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "As well as a liar and a murderer. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "As well as a liar and a murderer. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "As well as a liar and a murderer. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “是啊，我还是个骗子、杀人犯。如果你打算指控我，请不要遗漏我犯下的任何罪行，我不会否认我的罪责。”
languages.original_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，我还是个骗子、杀人犯。如果你打算指控我的话，请不要遗漏我犯下的任何罪行，我不会否认我的罪责。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「嘘つきであり、殺人者でもある。私を告訴するのであれば、私の罪を一切省くな。否定することはないのだから」
languages.original_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."

traits.locale_text: 「嘘つきであり、殺人者でもある。私を告訴するのであれば、私の罪を一切省くな。否定することはないのだから」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Y mentiroso y asesino. Si va a acusarme, asegúrese de no omitir ninguno de mis crímenes, pues no los negaré».
languages.original_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."

traits.locale_text: «Y mentiroso y asesino. Si va a acusarme, asegúrese de no omitir ninguno de mis crímenes, pues no los negaré».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Und ein Lügner und Mörder. Wenn Ihr mich schon beschuldigt, zählt alle meine Verbrechen auf, denn ich werde sie nicht leugnen."
languages.original_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."

traits.locale_text: "Und ein Lügner und Mörder. Wenn Ihr mich schon beschuldigt, zählt alle meine Verbrechen auf, denn ich werde sie nicht leugnen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Ainsi qu'un menteur et un meurtrier. Si vous m'accusez, veillez à n'omettre aucun crime ; je n'en nierai aucun. »
languages.original_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi qu'un menteur et un meurtrier. Si vous m'accusez, veillez à n'omettre aucun crime ; je n'en nierai aucun. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Aynı zamanda yalancı ve katilim. Beni suçlayacaksan hiçbir suçumu görmezden gelme. Hiçbirini reddetmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "And a liar and murderer as well. If you are accusing me, do not omit any of my crimes, for I will not deny them."

traits.locale_text: "Bir yalancı ve katil de aynı zamanda. Eğer beni suçlayacaksan, suçlarımın hiçbirini görmezden gelme. Hiçbirini reddetmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
